title: Senior IT Infrastructure Engineer
company: Công ty Chứng khoán Guotai Junan (Việt Nam)
salary_range: Đăng nhập để xem mức lương
description: Mô tả công việc
Job Summary:
Job Summary:

The Senior Infrastructure Engineer plays a critical role in designing, implementing, and maintaining the IT infrastructure that supports our brokerage operations. This includes servers, storage, networks, and security systems. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of IT infrastructure technologies and a proven track record of delivering complex projects.
Key Responsibilities:
Key Responsibilities:

Design, implement, and maintain IT infrastructure solutions that meet the needs of the business.
Troubleshoot and resolve infrastructure issues in a timely and efficient manner.
Monitor infrastructure performance and identify opportunities for improvement.
Develop and maintain documentation of infrastructure systems and procedures.
Collaborate with other IT teams to ensure that infrastructure solutions are integrated effectively.
Stay up-to-date on the latest IT infrastructure technologies and trends.
Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior infrastructure engineers.
Design, implement, and maintain IT infrastructure solutions that meet the needs of the business.
Troubleshoot and resolve infrastructure issues in a timely and efficient manner.
Monitor infrastructure performance and identify opportunities for improvement.
Develop and maintain documentation of infrastructure systems and procedures.
Collaborate with other IT teams to ensure that infrastructure solutions are integrated effectively.
Stay up-to-date on the latest IT infrastructure technologies and trends.
Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior infrastructure engineers.
yc: Yêu cầu công việc

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. 5+ years of experience in IT infrastructure engineering.
Strong understanding of IT infrastructure technologies, including servers, storage, networks, and security.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.
Maintain accurate records of IT assets, licenses, and configurations. Prepare reports on IT performance, security incidents, and project status. Document IT processes and procedures for reference and training purposes.
Relevant certifications (e.g., Cisco CCNA or MCSE and Unix/Linux certification))
Foreign Languages: Good English/ good to understand related technical documents and good enought communication.
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. 5+ years of experience in IT infrastructure engineering.
